trans-unit.source: Implements an underlying type cache for all <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> derived types.
trans-unit.target: Implementa una cache di tipo sottostante per tutti i <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> tipi derivati.

trans-unit.source: DependencyObjectType represents a specific underlying system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: DependencyObjectType rappresenta un sistema sottostante specifico ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type>di un <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: DependencyObjectType is essentially a wrapper for the ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type> so that it can extend some of its capabilities.
trans-unit.target: DependencyObjectType è essenzialmente un wrapper per il ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) <xref:System.Type>in modo che la possibilità di estendere alcune delle rispettive funzionalità.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non ha costruttore pubblico.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can only be obtained through properties on other objects (such as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), or through the static method <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di questa classe possono essere ottenute solo tramite proprietà di altri oggetti (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>), o tramite il metodo statico <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.FromSystemType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> of the immediate base class of the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref> della classe base immediata dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo della classe di base.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> that represents a given system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref> che rappresenta un sistema specificato ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) tipo.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> maintains a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A> property that returns a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>, but this requires having a particular <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>gestisce un <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A>proprietà che restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>, ma è necessario disporre di un particolare <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>istanza.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.DependencyObjectType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: You can use this static utility method if you do not yet have a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance and require a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>.
trans-unit.target: Se si dispone ancora un' <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>istanza e richiedono un <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> , è possibile utilizzare questo metodo statico dell'utilità

trans-unit.source: The system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type to convert.
trans-unit.target: Il sistema ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) tipo da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> that represents the system ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref> che rappresenta il sistema ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]) tipo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation is linked to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di questa implementazione è collegata il <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Id%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash di un intero con segno a 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: Gets a zero-based unique identifier for constant-time array lookup operations.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un identificatore univoco in base zero per le operazioni di ricerca di matrice a tempo costante.

trans-unit.source: Do not use for general hashing functions.
trans-unit.target: Non utilizzare per le funzioni hash generali.

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee on this value.
trans-unit.target: Non vi è alcuna garanzia su questo valore.

trans-unit.source: It can vary between application runs.
trans-unit.target: Può variare a seconda dell'esecuzione dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: An internal identifier.
trans-unit.target: Un identificatore interno.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is an instance of the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato è un'istanza dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Objects of the exact same type return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti dello stesso tipo esatto restituiscono `true`.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare con l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the class represented by the current is in the inheritance hierarchy of the passed as d; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se la classe rappresentata dall'oggetto corrente è nella gerarchia di ereditarietà di passato come d ; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> derives from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref> deriva dall'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: if the dependencyObjectType parameter and the current represent types of classes, and the class represented by the current derives from the class represented by dependencyObjectType.
trans-unit.target: Se il dependencyObjectType parametro e corrente rappresentano tipi di classi e la classe rappresentata dall'oggetto corrente deriva dalla classe rappresentata dall'oggetto dependencyObjectType .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns if dependencyObjectType and the current represent the same class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce anche se dependencyObjectType corrente e rappresentano la stessa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto rappresentato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] tipo di sistema.

trans-unit.source: The value of Name is the same string as the name of the type name of the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del nome è la stessa stringa come il nome del nome del tipo di <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the represented [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'oggetto rappresentato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] tipo di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] rappresentato da questo tipo di sistema <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] system type represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] rappresentato da questo tipo di sistema <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObjectType"> </xref>.
